monsters.name: Flamespew (Intro)
monsters.condition_immunities: Charmed, Grappeled, Frightened, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained
monsters.Weaknesses: Bludgening to stuff _around_ Flamespew, attacking parts of the arena itself

actions.name: Steam Vent Activation
actions.desc: At the end of each its turns, Flamespew rolls a d{CW,CCW} to determine which way to swing it's scythe next turn. Steam vents activate in the direction in which it will travel

actions.name: Wither
actions.desc: At the end of each of it's turns, it withers by 5d8. Flamespew dies if it has less than 10HP remaining.

actions.name: Flame Jet
actions.desc: 1d10 Fire damage, +5 to hit, reach the whole arena.

legendary_actions.name: Flame Jet
legendary_actions.desc: as the action, on a won coinflip each turn

legendary_actions.name: Flame Scythe
legendary_actions.desc: Rotate a Wall of Flame in the currently indicated direction
